Introduction to Motility Tracking¶

This tracking program was created in the Parker Lab to plot and analyze the motility of active points in cell movies. The analysis is gathered from track lag data by plotting the Mean Squared Displacement Per Lag and a histogram of Mean Single Lag Distances. Tracks can be filtered accordingly for analysis of immotile/extremely motile clusterings.

Getting Started¶

Motility Tracking currently only supports .bin files exported from Origin.
